name: webgriffe/functional-test-trait
description: Trait which enables functional testing in Magento with EcomDev_PHPUnit and using a CgiHttpKernel.

suggest.ecomdev/ecomdev_phpunit: Allows to load fixtures before your functional tests.
suggest.webgriffe/config-extension: Allows to use the EcomDev_PHPUnit database in your functional tests.
suggest.symfony/css-selector: Allows to filter DOM elements with CSS selectors.
